title: Reorder To-Do Actions column and remove overtime date helper text

requirements.summary: Move the To-Do table “Actions” column (header + row cells) to the leftmost position.
acceptanceCriteria: In the To-Do table header, the “Actions” <th> renders as the first (leftmost) column header.
For each To-Do table row, the cell containing the Edit/Done buttons renders as the first (leftmost) cell in that row.
All existing button behaviors remain unchanged (Edit opens edit dialog; Done opens mark-done dialog).
No other columns’ data/content is changed; only the column order is updated.

file_operations.description: Reorder the To-Do tasks table columns so the “Actions” header and its corresponding row cell (Edit/Done buttons) render first, before the existing pin and data columns, without changing button handlers/behavior or any other column content.

requirements.summary: Remove the helper/example paragraph rendered under the overtime Date input.
acceptanceCriteria: The helper text paragraph under the overtime Date field is no longer rendered.
The Date input field remains present and continues to validate DD-MM-YYYY as before.
No new helper text is added in place of the removed paragraph.

file_operations.description: Delete the date format example/helper paragraph under the overtime Date input while leaving the Date input, placeholder, and existing DD-MM-YYYY validation logic unchanged.
